meta.Title: WITH HINTS FROM THE HEADLINES [New York Times, Sunday, June 10, 1945]
meta.Author: Lester Keene

across.question: Broke diplomatic relations with Japan, April 11.

down.question: Peninsula, NW Alaska, named for Lincoln's Secretary of State.
